languages.text: At the start of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each creature with {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: At the start of his turn the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum wounds for each creature with bleeding in combat.

At the start of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each creature with {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} in combat.

At the start of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each creature with {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} in combat.

languages.text: 自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に、堕落した貴族は戦闘中に{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}している生物1匹につき自分の最大の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の5%を回復する。
languages.original_text: At the start of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each creature with {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: 自分のターン開始時に、堕落した貴族は戦闘中に出血している生物1体につき自分の最大の傷の5％を回復する。

languages.text: 腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，战场中每有一只{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}的生物，腐化贵族就会恢复5%最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: At the start of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each creature with {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: 腐化贵族回合开始时，战场中每有一只流血的生物，腐化贵族就会恢复5%最大生命值。

languages.text: Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el noble corrupto recupera un 5 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas por cada criatura con {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} en el combate.
languages.original_text: At the start of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each creature with {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Al principio de su turno, el noble corrupto recupera un 5 % de sus heridas máximas por cada criatura con hemorragia en el combate.

languages.text: Zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} stellt der verdorbene Adlige für jede Kreatur, die im Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutet{/g}, 5 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wieder her.
languages.original_text: At the start of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each creature with {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn seines Zuges stellt der verdorbene Adlige für jede Kreatur, die im Kampf blutet, 5 % seiner maximalen Wunden wieder her.

languages.text: Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le noble corrompu récupère 5 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum par créature victime de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} au combat.
languages.original_text: At the start of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each creature with {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Au début de son tour, le noble corrompu récupère 5 % de sa réserve de blessures maximum par créature victime de l'effet Saignement au combat.

languages.text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} оскверненный дворянин восстанавливает себе 5% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за каждое существо с эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} в бою.
languages.original_text: At the start of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each creature with {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: В начале своего хода оскверненный дворянин восстанавливает себе 5% от максимального здоровья за каждое существо с эффектом кровотечения в бою.
В начале своего хода оскверненный дворянин восстанавливает себе 5% от максимального здоровья за каждое существо с эффектом кровотечения в бою.

languages.text: Yoz soylu, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başında çatışmada {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kan kaybeden{/g} her yaratık için maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %5'ini tazeler.
languages.original_text: At the start of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble restores 5% of his maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each creature with {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} in combat.
